titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Donald A. Unis papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Arab-American activist from Dearborn, Michigan; founder of the Arab Community Center for Economic and Social Services (ACCESS).
archdesc.scopecontent: Scrapbook largely of clippings with some published materials; and biographical information.

subject.term: Center for Arab American Studies collections.

corpname.primary_name: Arab Community Center for Economic and Social Services
